ComicInfo.Summary: ...For Your Love: Moose mourns the death of Wayne (even though he isn't really dead). Golgoth tries to get Lilith to tell him the location of the Sword of Michael. Wayne wakes up in his apartment to find the demon lord Pyrus (who tried to kill him last issue) hanging out and watching television. Satan begins to look for his wayward son.
ComicInfo.Title: ...For Your Love
